1.title: Boobay at Tekla, muntik nang matokhang?

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Boobay and Tekla playfully documented the experience of opening packages from their loyal followers. But the content of one particular package sent shivers down their spine.

2.title: Dear Boobay and Tekla: Ang nakakalokang edition!

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Boobay and Tekla received another batch of letters sent by fans from all over the country and around the world. Which questions have frustrated them the most? Find out in the latest edition of 'Dear Boobay and Tekla.'

3.title: Matthias Rhoads at Jeric Gonzales, hinubaran?

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: In this Extreme Clothes Swap Challenge, Boobay and Tekla will swap clothes with Kapuso heartthrobs Matthias Rhoads and Jeric Gonzales, respectively. Nothing can prepare you for the moment when the switcheroo is completed and revealed.

4.title: Prank You! Kapuso stars napagtripan!

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Boobay and Tekla will pull a prank on two of their closest friends in showbiz. Will they be convincing enough to pull it off?

5.title: Tekla, may ipinasok sa pantalon ni Rayver Cruz

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: 'Asawa Ko, Karibal Ko' stars Kris Bernal, Thea Tolentino, and Rayver Cruz had fun while playing our new game, "What's In My Pants Challenge," where random objects were stuffed in their pants and they must guess an item to score a point.

6.title: 24 Daring Questions: Controversial Edition

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Your favorite 24 Questions is back. Boobay and Tekla will answer 24 thought provoking questions including one that concerns President Duterte.

7.title: Most controversial showbiz questions, sinagot sa TBATS

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Based on the original Truth and Consequence game, Boobay and Tekla have two choices: Answer a controversial question truthfully or eat something disgusting. Who will down a glass of ampalaya puree or a plate of ox brain? Will Tekla reveal the name of the celebrity he'd rather not work with again? Who among Boobay's Sunday Pinasaya colleagues is the "pinakapasaway tuwing rehearsals?"

8.title: The Most Hilarious Halloween Tips Ever

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: Here's a list of DOs and DON'Ts during the observance of Undas 2018 courtesy of Boobay and Tekla. The fantastic duo will also share some Undas anecdotes.

9.title: Dear Boobay and Tekla: Halloween Edition

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: Boobay and Tekla react to online comments of avid TBATS viewers across the nation and all over the globe.

10.title: Mga bagay na hindi kilala ng Millennials

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: In this #ThrowbackThursday episode, Boobay and Tekla talk about things that children of today may no longer recognize such as typewriter, beeper, and cassette tape.

11.title: Prank You! Donita Nose, lagot ka kay Tekla

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

11.plot: Boobay pulls a telephone prank on a Kapuso actress while Tekla becomes the victim of a prank that he tried to pull on a Kapuso comedienne.

12.title: 'Try Not to Laugh Challenge', sino ang bubuga ng tubig?

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

12.plot: The comedic duo Boobay and Tekla try the viral 'Try Not To Laugh Challenge' with a twist. Who brings their A game to this challenge? Let's find out.

13.title: Eat-All-You-Can Kakanin: The Most Challenging Mukbang

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

13.plot: In the TBATS version of the YouTube hit Mukbang, Boobay and Tekla get to eat different kinds of kakanin. While eating, the tandem share some outrageous factoids on each food item.

14.title: Malas at swerte sa 'Year of the Earth Pig - 2019'

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

14.plot: For 2019, a feng shui expert reveals the lucky and not so lucky people based on their animal signs. Find out your lucky color, lucky number, and lucky charm in the Year of the Earth Pig.

15.title: The Most Hated Christmas Gifts

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

15.plot: Comedy duo Boobay and Tekla identifies the most hated gifts and explains the reason why. Whatever you receive this Christmas, be thankful for what you have. It's really the thought that counts.

16.title: Ricci Rivero, naki-TBATS!!!

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

16.plot: Ricci Rivero of UP Fighting Maroons shows his funny side in this episode of 'The Boobay and Tekla Show.'

17.title: Funniest Videos from Boobay and Tekla

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

17.plot: Boobay and Tekla react to their past episodes from 'The Boobay and Tekla Show.'

1.title: 24 Daring Questions

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Boobay and Tekla will answer 24 thought-provoking, rib-tickling and sometimes, rhetorical questions in 'The Boobay and Tekla Show (TBATS).' The first episode sets the tone for the rest of TBATS' season: spontaneous, unrehearsed, outrageous and genuinely funny.

2.title: Year of the Dog Horoscope Part 1

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Boobay and Tekla will dish out the most "accurate," most hilarious and unabashedly biting forecast for each of the 12 animal signs of the Chinese zodiac.There will be predictions on love, money, and health.

3.title: Year of the Dog Horoscope Part 2

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Watch the second part of this hilarious forecast for each of the 12 animal signs in the Chinese zodiac. Find out Boobay and Tekla's predictions on love, money, and health for the Year of the Earth Dog.

4.title: Thirdy Ravena

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: In this acting workshop, Thirdy Ravena will choose his rightful girlfriend between Boobay and Tekla. Watch more hilarious antics from the comedic duo on 'The Boobay and Tekla Show.'

5.title: Ateneo vs. Atenekla Taste Challenge

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: Thirdy Ravena will duke it out with Tekla in a taste test challenge to be moderated by Boobay. It's Ateneo vs. Atenekla. The loser has to face a consequence which will be determine by spinning the dreaded Wheel of Challenges.

6.title: Daring Questions: Street Food Edition

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Boobay and Tekla get to chat with ordinary folks who make a living on the street. A buko vendor, a peanut vendor, and a fishball vendor gamely answered the duo's clever questions.

7.title: Tekla, dinadaya ni Boobay?

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Boobay and Tekla try to outsmart each other in a celebrity trivia game. They must guess the birth names of local stars. Who will win the battle?

8.title: Sino si Janet Duterte?

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: In the part 1 of the 'Name Game,' Boobay surprised Tekla by scoring the first four points of the game. Will Tekla allow Boobay to cruise to an easy victory? Find out who will emerge as the winner and who will spin the Wheel of Challenges in the exciting battle.

9.title: Tekla, may kakaibang pinaamoy kay Boobay

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: The stars of 'Ang forever ko'y ikaw,' Bruno Gabriel and Ayra Mariano will try to pit their wits against Boobay and Tekla.

10.title: Eight Daring Letters

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: Boobay and Tekla will try to address and give solutions to some of the problems their viewers encounter.

11.title: Scare Box Challenge

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

11.plot: Boobay and Tekla take on the hugely popular "What's in the Box" or "Scare Box" Challenge Using the craziest mystery objects, the duo freaked each other out in a simple game that turned into a screamfest. The winner is crowned 'Reyna ng Kapaan.'

12.title: Pick-Up Lines Freestyle Battle 2018

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

12.plot: Mag-ingay ang maiingay. Boobay and Tekla brought the house down with their lightning-quick improvisations of pick-up and hugot lines. Will their antics impress the hunky One Up guests?

13.title: Tape mo mukha mo

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

13.plot: Boobay goes head to head with Tekla in a tricky trivia quiz with a twist. Victory will be claimed by the dauntless while the loser goes home 'faceless.' Who's your bet?

14.title: Dyowascope: Predicting Your Lover's Landi Levels

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

14.plot: Boobay and Tekla are back with their fearless predictions. This time, their bizarre vibrations are intended for couples -married or not. The forecasts are based on the date of the couple's 'monthsary' or 'anniversary.' If you ignore them, you'll have bad luck for the rest of the year. If you believe them, you'll have bad luck for the rest of the month. You've been warned. Make a choice.

15.title: Showbiz's Most Daring Blind Items

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

15.plot: In this episode of 'The Boobay and Tekla Show,' prepare to be served with the juiciest gossip stories about some local celebrities.

16.title: Daring Questions: Personalan Edition

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

16.plot: Due to high public demand, Boobay and Tekla bring back the '24 Daring Questions!' The comic duo answer some personal and funny questions on-the-spot and it will definitely make you burst into laughter.

1.title: Dear Boobay and Tekla: Pikunan Edition

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: In the second season premiere of 'The Boobay and Tekla Show,' Boobay and Tekla bring back the hilarious 'Dear Boobay and Tekla' segment.The duo will read letters sent by people from all over the country and around the world. They'll be dishing out pieces of advice on love, money, and career. Some of the letters contain random queries demanding answers from the funtastic duo. A couple of questions will also test the patience of Boobay and Tekla. Will they be able to finish reading all or will they be forced to walk away out of frustration?

2.title: Lie Detector Test Challenge

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Boobay and Tekla will undergo a lie detector test in a game called "Truth or Charot." Faced with the toughest personal questions answerable only by Yes or No, the tandem's character will be put to the test. A polygraph expert determines if they are being truthful or not with their answers.

3.title: Daring Questions: Quiapo Edition

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Have you ever wondered what those "Pampa" products in Quiapo are made of? In a hilarious, no-holds-barred conversation with Boobay and Tekla, the vendors of Quiapo revealed the ingredients and use of their products from lucky charms and love potions to a variety of medicinal concoctions. One particular question that baffled the vendors was asked by Boobay: Batay sa aming aura, kami po ba ni Tekla ay nakulam, namatanda, o isinumpa? What will the vendors say? How will the hosts react? Catch this laugh-out-loud encounter with the masses only here on 'The Boobay and Tekla...

4.title: Tetay game na game mag-TBATS

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: The Queen of All Media in a tell-all interview. Kapuso talent Divine Tetay will showcase her best impression of multimedia star Kris Aquino in a fun Q&A that will tackle Krissy's family, career, and love life. For the first time, she'll address intriguing questions like the following: Why is she so fond of basketball players? How's her on and off romance with "Mayor?" When is she making another horror movie? Krissy will likewise show off her dramatic acting chops while delivering memorable lines from classic Filipino movies. If you've missed the Queen of All Media, ...

5.title: Boobay and Tekla Try Out the 'Not My Arms' Challenge

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Daring Questions: Carinderia Edition

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Have you ever watched a comedy talk show shot directly under the train station? That's what you'll see in 'The Boobay and Tekla Show.' A carinderia owner shares her experience in the underground food business with Boobay and Tekla. She'll also talk about the best-selling ulam these days. They will also have a street food eating contest with their respective carinderia crew.

7.title: The Most Hilarious Rap Battle with Flict-G and Dello

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Boobay and Tekla -with seasoned rappers as teammates - battle it out in two rounds of impromptu rap battle. Will they deliver or will they fail? It's Boobay and Flict-G vs. Tekla and Dello in the first ever TBATS Rap Battle. Can you guess which pair will win?

8.title: 24 Daring Questions: 'London' Edition

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: TBATS goes to London? Totoo bang binisita nina Boobay at Tekla ang Abbey Road sa Westminster, London para sa kanilang 24 Daring Questions?

9.title: Mouthguard Challenge

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: Boobay and Tekla will team up with hunky actors Martin Del Rosario and David Licauco in this outrageous game. Wearing a mouthguard and looking ridiculously funny while uttering words and phrases to be guessed by their respective partners, the hunks displayed their competitive vibe as they tried to win it for their team. Who do you think will emerge victorious: Team Boobay and Martin or Team Tekla and David?

10.title: Inflation rate, inalam nina Boobay at Tekla!

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: Boobay and Tekla caught up with an owner of a fruit stand and a sari-sari store. The spontaneously fun conversation centered on how small businesses are coping with the high inflation. The tandem will also give us an update on the prices of basic commodities.

11.title: Spicy Noodle Challenge: Extra Hot Edition

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

11.plot: This challenge will test Boobay and Tekla's tolerance for spicy food. Each paired with a local, Boobay and Tekla will outpace each other in finishing a plate of spicy noodles. The loser must eat an extra plate.

12.title: Celebrity Bluff: TBATS Edition

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

12.plot: For those who miss 'Celebrity Bluff,' here's an exciting game where Boobay and Tekla showcase their bluffing abilities. The duo take turns opening mystery boxes. Player 1 will describe and identify the object inside the chosen box. Player 2 will then say whether Player 1 is telling the truth or not. A point is scored for each correct answer. There's a catch though: some of the objects inside the boxes are crazy food items which either player must consume if they give an incorrect answer.

13.title: Accent Challenge with Andre Paras

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

13.plot: Boobay, Tekla and their special guest, Andre Paras will take on the Accent Challenge. In the three-way battle, they will alternately recite a phrase in a specific language or accent, e.g. British, Italian, jejemon, La Sallista, etc. The other players must guess the correct accent for them to earn a point. The player with the most correct guesses wins the game while the loser must face a consequence.

14.title: The Best 'Psychics' in the Philippines

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

14.plot: Our psychic wannabes take Quiapo by storm as they attempt to "read" fortunes of ordinary people. Using different methods like card reading, palmistry, and eye contact, Boobay and Tekla will attempt to give predictions on love, career, and health. Can they pull off the stunt in front of a crazy Quiapo crowd?

15.title: Street Games Challenge

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

15.plot: It's a throwback moment for Boobay and Tekla as they get to play their childhood games with the street kids of Manila. It's Team Boobay and Team Tekla once again in a series of games where the losing team will be penalized.

16.title: Tape mo, mukha mo Part 2

episode of.title: The Boobay and Tekla Show (TV Series 2018– )

16.plot: We end the season with the extremely amusing quiz, 'Tape Mo, Mukha Mo.' In this game, Boobay and Tekla will be asked about general knowledge questions. If either of them answered correctly, a piece of masking tape will be placed on his opponent's face. If the answer is incorrect, he gets to be "taped." Can you guess whose face will be unrecognizable by the end of the game?
